Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Evenly \E"ven*ly\, adv. With an even, level, or smooth surface; without roughness, elevations, or depression; uniformly; equally; comfortably; impartially; serenely. [1913 Webster]

evenly adv 1: in equal amounts or shares; in a balanced or impartial way; "a class evenly divided between girls and boys"; "they split their winnings equally"; "deal equally with rich and poor" [syn: {equally}] [ant: {unevenly}, {unevenly}] 2: in a level and regular way [ant: {unevenly}]
